replies.body:
Although you claim there to be 23 letters in the quadratic solarius, that doesn't affect the color of the peacock, or it's diameter. So the answer to that question is: The peacock is golden. I think, that's just my analysis. ;p

Anywho, back on topic. What's your favorite thing about Avicus, and why? When did you discover Avicus? How long have you been part of the Avicus Community?
